properties.name: Erie Tri. Unorg. FT
properties.note:
Erie Tri. Unorg. FT (1783-09-03)

1783/09/03 -> 1792/03/02

On 29 Oct 1782 New York ceded to the US any claim to territory west of the meridian of the western end of Lake Ontario, thereby defining its western boundary; the Erie Triangle in present Penn. is part of this cession. Map depicts area as of 3 Sep 1783.

(Cappon, Petchenik, and Long, 130; Van Zandt, 75)
